topics.body:
If Jurassic World actually existed, would you go?
No, what happened in the movie wouldn't occur, and the only way the dinosaurs would escape containment is if an employee was an idiot.

[bq="Carcass Strife"]If Jurassic World actually existed, would you go?
No, what happened in the movie wouldn't occur, and the only way the dinosaurs would escape containment is if an employee was an idiot. [/bq]
It couldn't like the movie, but there is another posible things that can happen.
Besides, a corporation will not know if a person is an idiot or not.

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557de90763687221fd001f7c#post_557de90763687221fd001f7c
I'm pretty sure she wasn't letting them get close enough to study. Remember, everything thing they spliced into her was classified. So they couldn't do proper tests. Combine that with extremely rapid maturation and you can see why they didn't know everything about her.
